title: LISTEN: Sunday Supplement podcast
description: Neil Ashton is joined by Sam Wallace, Jonathan Liew and John Cross to discuss all the main talking points from the football world.
content:
The trio discussed why they felt Pep Guardiola was within his rights to only name six substitutes against Burnley on Saturday and Manchester City are being targeted by bad fouls.
Also on the agenda was Arsenal and their transfer dealings in the January window, what this now means for Alexandre Lacazette as well as Everton's capitulation at the Emirates.
Paul Pogba being benched by Jose Mourinho and Chelsea's transfer business were also up for discussion, as were recent happenings at West Ham.
All that and more is available on the Sunday Supplement podcast this week.
Download the Sunday Supplement podcast now and subscribe to more via iTunes
